name: Into the Grove
description:
Some would say you don't need to go into a haunted forest just to get mushrooms, but to them I say "nay!" If there aren't any stakes how can you be proud of your mushrooms collection? 

Into the Grove has you playing as a badger who just wants some delicious fungus. Scour the forest for the succulent umbrella shaped veggie, but look out! A ghost lives in the forest! (oh no) He'll getcha! And no one knows what he'll do with you once that happens. I imagine it's pretty bad. When have you ever been caught by a ghost and something good happened afterwards?

But that's not all! Only having the mushrooms isn't enough! Once you have all of them, you gotta get out of there. Unless you want to stay in a haunted forest forever holding six mushrooms as you awkwardly avoiding the ghost that lives there.

After finishing my game, I hope you'll have time to tweet me your best time here (maybe hit that follow button too <3)

If you want to support my games (so I can make bigger and better ones), consider hitting up my patreon  

And feel free to join my discord server for a good, nay, a great time.
